data.title: Fate/Grand Order APK Download for Android
data.meta_description:
Download Fate/Grand Order APK (2.96.1) for Android for free. Fate's new RPG finally appears! You can enjoy authentic RPG even on a smartphone.
A story that you can enjoy overwhelming volumes of over 5 million characters!
data.text:
Fate's new RPG finally appears! You can enjoy authentic RPG even on a smartphone. A story that you can enjoy overwhelming volumes of over 5 million characters!

A Fate RPG brought to you by TYPE-MOON, which is familiar on TV!

You can enjoy a full-fledged RPG on your smartphone.

A story that you can enjoy with an overwhelming volume of over 5 million characters!

In addition to the main story, there are stories for each character, and the content is sure to satisfy both Fate fans and those experiencing the Fate world for the first time.

[Synopsis]

Year 2015.

Chaldea, which observes the future of Earth, has confirmed the fact that human history after 2017 has collapsed.

The "promised future" that existed until yesterday until 2115 suddenly disappeared without any warning.

why. Why. who. how.

2004 A.D. A local city in Japan.

Here, an ``unobservable area'' has appeared that never existed before.

Chaldea assumed that this was the cause of human extinction, and decided to carry out the sixth experiment, which was still in the experimental stage.

It's time travel to the past.

A forbidden ritual that transforms humans into spirits and sends them into the past, and intervenes in events to elucidate or destroy the singularity of space-time.

Its name is the Grand Order, the Order for the Protection of Humanity.

It is a general term for those who fight against fate and stand against human history in order to protect humanity.

[Game overview]

Easy-to-operate command order battle optimized for smartphones!

The player becomes the master and controls the heroic spirits to defeat enemies and solve mysteries.

Whether you fight with your favorite heroic spirit or a strong heroic spirit, the battle style is up to the player.

◆Gorgeous voice actors are participating one after another

Smartphones and tablets with Android 7.0 or later, 3GB or more required RAM, 4GB or more recommended RAM. (Intel CPU is not supported)

*Some models may not work even with the recommended version or higher.

*Qua tab PZ (LGT32) is not supported.

*OSes released as beta versions are not supported.

This application uses CRIWARE (TM) from CRI Middleware Co., Ltd.
